source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FX_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

properties.description: Copy file to Source Landing, extract view data, Insert or Update to relational.COA_Views, move to archive
Update or insert budget mapping for source text and move source to archive

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	process_name as string,
	ETL_local as string,
	useremail as string
}
source(output(
		View_Name as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Category as string,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item_Index as integer,
		Item as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MappingText
AuditFields alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
MappingText derive(Update_Time = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Process_Name = $process_name,
		UserEmail = $useremail) ~> AuditFields
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		View_Name as string,
		Category as string,
		process_name as string,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Item_Index as integer,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		CPM_Description as string,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		update_user as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['View_Name','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['UPDATE relational.COA_Views\nSET CPM_Code = COA.Reporting_5, GL_Desc = COA.GL_Desc\n\nFROM\n\nrelational.Chart_of_Account COA JOIN relational.COA_Views v on COA.GL_Code = v.GL_Code\n\nWHERE COA.record_deleted_flag = 0'],
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		View_Name,
		Category,
		process_name = Process_Name,
		Sub_Category,
		Item,
		Category_Index,
		Sub_Category_Index,
		Item_Index,
		update_datetime = Update_Time,
		update_user = UserEmail
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> COAViews

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Source Name} as string,
		{Source Type} as string,
		{Source Link} as string,
		{Source Data Type} as string,
		{Data Process Type} as string,
		{Source Status} as string,
		Frequency as string,
		{Confidence Level} as string,
		{Person Responsible} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Metric_Short_Name as string,
		Source_Name as string,
		Source_Type as string,
		Source_Link as string,
		Source_Data_Type as string,
		Data_Process_Type as string,
		Source_Status as string,
		Frequency as string,
		Confidence_Level as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Metric_Short_Name]\n      ,[Source_Name]\n      ,[Source_Type]\n      ,[Source_Link]\n      ,[Source_Data_Type]\n      ,[Data_Process_Type]\n      ,[Source_Status]\n      ,[Frequency]\n      ,[Confidence_Level]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Data_Source]\nWHERE Data_Source_Id != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimDataSourceLkp
DatamartDimDataSourceLkp select(mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name_Lkp = Metric_Short_Name,
		Source_Name_Lkp = Source_Name,
		Source_Type_Lkp = Source_Type,
		Source_Link_Lkp = Source_Link,
		Source_Data_Type_Lkp = Source_Data_Type,
		Data_Process_Type_Lkp = Data_Process_Type,
		Source_Status_Lkp = Source_Status,
		Frequency_Lkp = Frequency,
		Confidence_Level_Lkp = Confidence_Level,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp = Person_Responsible,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDataSourceLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimDataSourceLkp lookup({Source Metric} == Metric_Short_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({Source Metric})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Source Metric cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Source Metric})) || not(isNull({Source Name})) || not(isNull({Source Type})) || not(isNull({Source Link})) || 
not(isNull({Source Data Type})) || not(isNull({Data Process Type})) || not(isNull({Source Status})) || not(isNull(Frequency)) || 
not(isNull({Confidence Level})) || not(isNull({Person Responsible}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Metric_Short_Name_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Name}, Source_Name_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Type}, Source_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Link}, Source_Link_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Data Type}, Source_Data_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Data Process Type}, Data_Process_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Source Status}, Source_Status_Lkp) || 
notEquals(Frequency, Frequency_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Confidence Level}, Confidence_Level_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Person Responsible}, Person_Responsible_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({Source Metric},
		{Source Name},
		{Source Type},
		{Source Link},
		{Source Data Type},
		{Data Process Type},
		{Source Status},
		Frequency,
		{Confidence Level},
		{Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Source Name} = iifNull({Source Name}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Type} = iifNull({Source Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Link} = iifNull({Source Link}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Data Type} = iifNull({Source Data Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Data Process Type} = iifNull({Data Process Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Source Status} = iifNull({Source Status}, "Undefined"),
		Frequency = iifNull(Frequency, "Undefined"),
		{Confidence Level} = iifNull({Confidence Level}, "Undefined"),
		{Person Responsible} = iifNull({Person Responsible}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Metric_Short_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Source_Name = {Source Name},
		Source_Type = {Source Type},
		Source_Link = {Source Link},
		Source_Data_Type = {Source Data Type},
		Data_Process_Type = {Data Process Type},
		Source_Status = {Source Status},
		Frequency,
		Confidence_Level = {Confidence Level},
		Person_Responsible = {Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Source_Name = {Source Name},
		Source_Type = {Source Type},
		Source_Link = {Source Link},
		Source_Data_Type = {Source Data Type},
		Data_Process_Type = {Data Process Type},
		Source_Status = {Source Status},
		Frequency,
		Confidence_Level = {Confidence Level},
		Person_Responsible = {Person Responsible},
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Deliver Point Code} as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		{Delivery Point Desc} as string,
		{Delivery Point Long Desc} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT\n       [Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]\nWHERE Delivery_Point_ID != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp
RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp select(mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Desc,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp lookup({Deliver Point Code} == Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Delivery Point Code cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})) || not(isNull({Delivery Point})) || 
not(isNull({Delivery Point Desc})) || not(isNull({Delivery Point Long Desc}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Delivery Point}, Delivery_Point_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Delivery Point Desc}, Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Delivery Point Long Desc}, Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({Deliver Point Code},
		{Delivery Point},
		{Delivery Point Desc},
		{Delivery Point Long Desc},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Delivery Point} = iifNull({Delivery Point}, "Undefined"),
		{Delivery Point Desc} = iifNull({Delivery Point Desc}, "Undefined"),
		{Delivery Point Long Desc} = iifNull({Delivery Point Long Desc}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Deliver_Point_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Delivery_Point_Desc = {Delivery Point Desc},
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc = {Delivery Point Long Desc},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Delivery_Point_Desc = {Delivery Point Desc},
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc = {Delivery Point Long Desc},
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Product Code} as string,
		{Product Type} as string,
		{Product Global Grade} as string,
		{Product Desc} as string,
		{GL Code} as string,
		{Species Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Product_Global_Grade as string,
		Product_Desc as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT \n       [Product_Code]\n      ,[Product_Type]\n      ,[Product_Global_Grade]\n      ,[Product_Desc]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Species_Code]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Product]\nWHERE Product_Id != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartDimProductLkp
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT \n       [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\nFROM [datamart].[Dim_Species]\nWHERE Species_ID != -1',
	format: 'query') ~> DatamartSpeciesLkp
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT \n       [GL_Code]\n      ,[GL_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account] \n  WHERE GL_Code != \'\' \n  AND [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [end_datetime] = \'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalChartOfAccountLkp
DatamartDimProductLkp select(mapColumn(
		Product_Code_Lkp = Product_Code,
		Product_Type_Lkp = Product_Type,
		Product_Global_Grade_Lkp = Product_Global_Grade,
		Product_Desc_Lkp = Product_Desc,
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimProductLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimProductLkp lookup({Product Code} == Product_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Product_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Product_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Product_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'))) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
LookupChartOfAccount split(not(isNull({Product Code})) && 
(isNull({Species Code}) || not(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp))) &&
(isNull({GL Code}) || not(isNull(GL_Code_Lkp))),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Product Code cannot be empty or Invalid GL Code or Invalid Species Code"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Product Code})) || not(isNull({Product Type})) || not(isNull({Product Global Grade})) || 
not(isNull({Product Desc})) || not(isNull({GL Code})) || not(isNull({Species Code}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Product_Code_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Product Type}, Product_Type_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Product Global Grade}, Product_Global_Grade_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Product Desc}, Product_Desc_Lkp) || 
notEquals({GL Code}, GL_Code_Lkp) || 
notEquals({Species Code}, Species_Code_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy({Product Code},
		{Product Type},
		{Product Global Grade},
		{Product Desc},
		{GL Code},
		{Species Code},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name),
	DuplicateCount = count()) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive({Product Type} = iifNull({Product Type}, "Undefined"),
		{Product Desc} = iifNull({Product Desc}, "Undefined"),
		{Product Global Grade} = iifNull({Product Global Grade}, "Undefined"),
		{GL Code} = iifNull({GL Code}, "Undefined"),
		{Species Code} = iifNull({Species Code}, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
DatamartSpeciesLkp select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimSpeciesLkp
RelationalChartOfAccountLkp select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code_Lkp = GL_Code,
		GL_Desc_Lkp = GL_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalCoaLkp
DataTransformation, SelectDimSpeciesLkp lookup({Species Code} == Species_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimSpecies
LookupDimSpecies, SelectRelationalCoaLkp lookup({GL Code} == GL_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupChartOfAccount
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Species_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Code = {Product Code},
		Product_Type = {Product Type},
		Product_Global_Grade = {Product Global Grade},
		Product_Desc = {Product Desc},
		GL_Code = {GL Code},
		Species_Code = {Species Code},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Code = {Product Code},
		Product_Type = {Product Type},
		Product_Global_Grade = {Product Global Grade},
		Product_Desc = {Product Desc},
		GL_Code = {GL Code},
		Species_Code = {Species Code},
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Forex_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Forex_Type as string,
		Base_Currency_B as string,
		Target_Currency_B as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Forex_Date,Base_Currency,Target_Currency,Forex_Type,EOM_Rate,Avg_Mon_Rate)) ~> StagingAddChecksum
StagingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Forex_Date == Relation_Forex_Date
	&& Base_Currency == Relation_Base_Currency
	&& Target_Currency == Relation_Target_Currency
	&& Forex_Type == Relation_Forex_Type,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
GetCurrentRecord derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Forex_Date,Base_Currency,Target_Currency,Forex_Type,EOM_Rate,Avg_Mon_Rate)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	EOM_Rate!=Relation_EOM_Rate||Avg_Mon_Rate!=Relation_Avg_Mon_Rate,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Forex_Date = Forex_Date,
		Relation_Base_Currency = Base_Currency,
		Relation_Target_Currency = Target_Currency,
		Relation_EOM_Rate = EOM_Rate,
		Relation_Avg_Mon_Rate = Avg_Mon_Rate,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum,
		Relation_Forex_Type = Forex_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Forex_Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate,
		Forex_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Forex_Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Forex_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Relation_Forex_Date,
		Base_Currency = Relation_Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency = Relation_Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate = Relation_EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Relation_Avg_Mon_Rate,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		Forex_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
RelationDB filter(record_deleted_flag == 0) ~> GetCurrentRecord
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Forex_Type as string,
		Base_Currency_B as string,
		Target_Currency_B as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Forex_Date','Base_Currency','Target_Currency','process_name','Forex_Type'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Forex_Type
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string,
		Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToStagingDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate = EOM_Rate_Converted,
		Average_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate_Converted,
		Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		EOM_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(EOM_Rate, 18, 7),
		Average_Mon_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(Average_Mon_Rate,18,7)) ~> ConvertStringToStagingDataType
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency),
	asc(Date, false),
	asc(Base_Currency, false),
	asc(Target_Currency, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency
AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Forex_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate,
		Forex_Type = Type
	)) ~> StagingDB
